name: Classic Cheeseburger
description: A juicy beef patty with melted cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles, served on a toasted bun.

name: Veggie Wrap
description: A healthy wrap filled with grilled vegetables, hummus, and a light vinaigrette dressing.

name: Spicy Chicken Wings
description: Crispy chicken wings tossed in a spicy, tangy buffalo sauce, served with a side of ranch dressing.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: A classic pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, basil, and tomato sauce on a thin, crispy crust.

name: Chocolate Milkshake
description: A creamy and indulgent milkshake made with rich chocolate ice cream and topped with whipped cream.

name: Butter Chicken
description: Tender chicken pieces cooked in a creamy tomato-based sauce with a rich blend of spices, served with naan or rice.

name: Paneer Tikka
description: Marinated paneer cubes grilled to perfection, served with mint chutney and onion rings.

name: Chicken Biryani
description: Aromatic basmati rice layered with spiced chicken, cooked to perfection with saffron and served with raita.

name: Aloo Paratha
description: Whole wheat flatbread stuffed with spiced mashed potatoes, served with yogurt and pickles.

name: Mango Lassi
description: A refreshing yogurt-based drink blended with ripe mangoes, perfect to complement any meal.
